渼字的基本解释

渼
měi
〔渼陂〕古池名，在今中国陕西省户县西，源出终南山，西北流入涝水。
水波。

渼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［měi］
［《廣韻》無鄙切，上旨，明。］
［《集韻》母鄙切，上旨，明。］
见“渼陂”。

渼字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　渼； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页635第19
【唐韻】無鄙切【集韻】【韻會】毋鄙切，?音美。水名。【長安志】渼陂，在鄠縣西四五里。　又【類篇】一曰水波文。

ripple
Basic explanation of words
ripple
měi
〔渼陂〕The name of the ancient pond originated from Zhongnan Mountain in the west of Huxian County, Shaanxi Province, China, and flooded into the northwest.
Water waves.
ripple

[①] [měi]
["Guangyun" is not contemptuous, purposeful, and clear. ]
["Jiyun" mother contemptuous, decreed, clear. ]

【Siji 1】【Shuizi Department】　渼; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 635 Page 19
[Tang Yun] No contemptuous cut [Jiyun] [Rhyme] No contemptible cut, beautiful sound. Water name. [Chang'an Zhi] Meipi, in Xisiwuli, Huxian County.　[Classes] One is the hydrography.
